newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Swiss 3-month money market claims yield 1.748 pct.
newsitem.headline: Swiss 3-month money market claims yield 1.748 pct.

text.p: The annual yield on the latest issue of Swiss federal government three-month money market claims is 1.748 percent, up from the previous issue's 1.649 percent, the Swiss National Bank said.
The latest issue, to be paid for on March 27, raised 1,181.8 million Swiss francs and was priced at 99.560 percent.
The previous issue, paid for on March 20, raised 1,146.35 million and was priced at 99.585 percent.
